amendment.description: Amendment adds to the passenger rail system comparison study a request to study train horn technology, with an emphasis on reducing train horn noise and its effect on local communities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 110-703 to add to the passenger rail system comparison study a request to study train horn technology, with an emphasis on reducing train horn noise and its effect on local communities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McCarthy (NY) amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
